title: (x) Taye Diggs & Idina Menzel squarish sans - Stainless {Mike Y}
content:
looking for this type… used to know it but cannot remeber :…. (  
damned brain !

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [prem.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070311012539/http:/typophile.com/files/prem.jpg) | 17.53 KB |
author: docunagi

comments.content: close but not… look at the -gg- and the M

I think it’s Stainless.

- Mike Yanega

[Here is a test drive at FontShop.](http://web.archive.org/web/20070311012539/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&startrow=1&records=20&currpage=1&totalrecords=4&searchby=&searchID=&searchletter=&searchstr=Stainless&font_categories_checkbox=font_name_search&fontRendererText=Taye+Diggs+%26+SHARE)

- Mike Yanega

Make that [Stainless Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20070311012539/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FB.112000.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Taye+Diggs+%26+SHARE&sampleSize=32), to be exact.

- Mike Yanega
